name: safesteamtools
description: Legal, malware-free implementation of steamtools.net features

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: KYOP
